programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Ngayon At Kailanman
programme.desc: Eva fights to reclaim her place in the wealthy Cortes family while searching for the truth about her identity. Fate brings her together with Inno, and their love story endures family secrets, rivalry and tragedy as they discover the real meaning of forgiveness and redemption.

programme.title: Lavender Fields
programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: A paradise like no other - La Playa Roja is your ultimate escape! But behind its beauty lies danger, and soon, you'll see RED. Are you ready for the fight to survive?

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: Pamilya Sagrado
programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.title: TV Patrol Global Edition
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: Alone/Together
programme.desc: College sweethearts Christine and Raf meet again for the first time, five years after their breakup. As both now live a life different from each other, their reunion takes them back to their youth, their dreams, and the feelings they shared back in the day.

programme.title: Lavender Fields
programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.title: Pamilya Sagrado
programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.title: Ngayon At Kailanman
programme.desc: Eva fights to reclaim her place in the wealthy Cortes family while searching for the truth about her identity. Fate brings her together with Inno, and their love story endures family secrets, rivalry and tragedy as they discover the real meaning of forgiveness and redemption.

programme.title: Are You G? with MJ Felipe
programme.desc: Are you G with spontaneous adventures? Unfiltered talks? Raw experiences? Heart-to-heart exclusives? Then you're definitely G with MJ Felipe!

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.title: Kapamilya Daily Mass
programme.desc: A daily celebration of the Liturgy of the Lord.

programme.title: Gising Pilipinas
programme.desc: Spice up your morning with a rousing round-up of the biggest news stories and live reports from field correspondents.

programme.title: It's Showtime LIVE
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa ep 13
programme.desc:
This is a story of revenge by Norman Dela Cruz, a 
loving son, and he aspires to become a lawyer for 
the underprivileged. After his mother was killed, he 
vowed to seek revenge against the influential 
retired judge, Benito Balmores.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa ep 14
programme.desc:
This is a story of revenge by Norman Dela Cruz, a 
loving son, and he aspires to become a lawyer for 
the underprivileged. After his mother was killed, he 
vowed to seek revenge against the influential 
retired judge, Benito Balmores.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 200
programme.desc: The series is based on the graphic novel created by Carlo J. Caparas. Totoy Bato, a young man, fighting for justice for his lost loved ones; also fighting for equality and fairness against his old friend turned nemesis Dwayne.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 201
programme.desc: The series is based on the graphic novel created by Carlo J. Caparas. Totoy Bato, a young man, fighting for justice for his lost loved ones; also fighting for equality and fairness against his old friend turned nemesis Dwayne.

programme.title: Team A S1 ep 6
programme.desc: Janet and Ian started a simple life together, but will their maried life be as happy as they dreamed to be when both their parents treat each other as enemy?

programme.title: Sing Galing: Singlebrity Edition ep 41
programme.desc: Sing Galing: Sing-lebrity Edition, aims to provide fun, laughter, music and excitement with the added goal of helping as celebrities sing and play for their chosen beneficiaries.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Bernardo Carpio ep 1
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Beloved
programme.desc: Friendship takes a violent turn when Adora (played by Nora Aunor) finds that she's a pawn in the intriguing games in life and love being played by her employer and close friend Renee (played by Hilda Koronel.).

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 6
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Beloved
programme.desc: Friendship takes a violent turn when Adora (played by Nora Aunor) finds that she's a pawn in the intriguing games in life and love being played by her employer and close friend Renee (played by Hilda Koronel.).

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 6
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 1
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: Team A S1 ep 6
programme.desc: Janet and Ian started a simple life together, but will their maried life be as happy as they dreamed to be when both their parents treat each other as enemy?

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Bea Montenegro ep 12
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. Hot off the heels from her last cold case, investigative journalist Christine Del Mundo (Maui Taylor) is back with a brand new cold case. This time, it involves actress Bea Montenegro, whose death has only brought forth one suspect - a fellow model who suffers from face blindness.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 8
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 6

programme.title: Di na Muli ep 6
programme.desc:
Di Na Muli tells the story of a young woman who tries to overcome her 
life's biggest regret (complicated by her special ability to see how much 
time remains of someone’s life) but ends up falling in love with the man 
who caused the death of her one great lov.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Beloved
programme.desc: Friendship takes a violent turn when Adora (played by Nora Aunor) finds that she's a pawn in the intriguing games in life and love being played by her employer and close friend Renee (played by Hilda Koronel.).

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 23
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 60
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Carpool ep 3
programme.desc: Carpool' revolves around four individuals whose lives get thrown into chaos after sharing a carpool ride which ended up in a tragic accident. A streak of unfortunate events seemingly taking them down.

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 1
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Pandoy... Alalay Ng Panday
programme.desc: In Pandoy, Joey De Leon gave a comic twist to the popular \"Panday,\" a fictional action hero popularized by the King himself, Fernando Poe, Jr.

programme.title: Sana Bukas Pa Ang Kahapon (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Three friends made their way in the big city. In the end they all thought of the things they should never have done, wondering what might have been had these tomorrows been their yesterdays.

programme.title: Marami Ka Pang Kakaining Bigas
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia played a veteran cop who rose from the ranks and who survived by his wits. Joko Diaz, on the other hand, was a young graduate from the police academy who did everything by the book.

programme.title: Dodong Armado
programme.desc: Raymart played Dodong, a young man who was trying to escape the memory of a tragic childhood which claimed the lives of his parents.

programme.title: Silang Matatapang (Walang Atras Sa Laban)
programme.desc: Raymond Bagatsing is set to plunge headstrong into this action picture. His voluptuous real life girlfriend, Shirley Fuentes, is part of the cast in this slambang action movie.

programme.title: Friends In Love (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Set in the sprawling campus of Brent School in scenic Baguio City, young stars Sharon, William, Jackie Lou and Rowell played a game of romantic musical chairs in this heartwarming story. Opposites attract and they were all faced with the difficulty of adjusting to the differences in their personalities.

programme.title: Apoy Sa Puso
programme.desc: This is a love story as torrid and as passionate as a smouldering volcano.

programme.title: Bruce Liit
programme.desc: Bruce (Niño Muhlach) is eager to learn karate specially when he sees his father practice. But Miguel (Ramon Zamora) keeps on postponing his son's instruction deeming Bruce too young to appreciate the principles behind this particular vocation.

programme.title: Nag-Iisang Ikaw
programme.desc: Cissy (Mikee Cojuangco) started to doubt if Albert (Matthew Mendoza) was the right man for her. While working for a fashion magazine, she met a photographer, Aaron (Keempee De Leon).

programme.title: The Flor Contemplacion Story (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The tragic tale of the Filipino maid hanged for the murder in Singapore in 1995 not only called the attention to the plight of overseas workers everywhere in the world but also resulted in one of the most acclaimed films in Philippine motion picture history.

programme.title: Alfredo Lim: Batas Ng Maynila
programme.desc: This film is based on the life story of policeman Alfredo Lim who rose from street cop to director of the National Bureau of Investigation and eventually Mayor of the City of Manila.

programme.title: Kapitan Tumba
programme.desc: Roi Vinzon attained full stardom in Kapitan Tumba, the true-to-life controversial story of Capt. Jose Huevos of Bulacan.

programme.title: Ang Boyfriend Kong Gamol (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Alice Dixson plays a rich woman who returns in the country with a plan to reach out to the poor and stop poverty. She decides to disguise herself so she can penetrate the poor community and in the process she meets Andrew E and falls in love with him despite their social differences.

programme.title: Carding Estrabel: Tirador Ng Malabon
programme.desc: One of the heroes that emerged during the Japanese occupation was the soldier-killer Carding (Dante Varona). After the war, Carding became a policeman and as such, continued his work of ridding the force of its corrupt elements.

programme.title: Chick Boy
programme.desc: Stars in this comedy about university students living in the fast lane though they cannot afford to. They find work as helpers to a rich woman with three beautiful nieces. Of course they turn on the charm for the girls and their aunt.

programme.title: Urban Rangers
programme.desc: Urban warfare could be as dangerous as being in a battle zone. This was discovered by a group of young idealistic new graduates from the police academy who were unjustly sent to prison because they refused to condone the corruption in the force.

programme.title: Sinasamba Kita (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lorna, the illegitimate daughter of a business tycoon was left in the care of her half-sister, Vilma, upon the death of their father. Though she took care of all her material needs, she refused to show the girl any kind of affection.

programme.title: Isla
programme.desc: Beauty Queen, Maria Isabel Lopez portrayed the role of Isla, the island maiden who has all the males, including her father, lusting after her. Her dream was to leave her primitive surroundings and find another life in the big city.

programme.title: Jabidah Massacre
programme.desc: Based on the expose made by the late Senator Benigno \"Ninoy\" Aquino, Jabidah Massacre chronicles the story of how a group of recruits are turned into soldiers for a secret mission - the invasion of Sabah.

programme.title: Darna, Ang Pagbabalik (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: While trying to find her grandmother and little brother, Ding, Narda is viciously struck in the head and the stone that furnishes her power is stolen. Before the inevitable face-off with Valentina, Darna gains a new ally when she helps police lieutenant Max Ablan.

programme.title: Oo Na Sige Na
programme.desc: When their relationship was discovered, Shirley was made to choose between father and boyfriend,Bonggoy.

programme.title: Tag-Araw, Tag-Ulan
programme.desc: A woman who was running away from the pain of a broken love affair. A young man who was looking forward to a fun-filled summer and his first sex experience.

programme.title: Alyas Baby Tsino (Tatagos Sa Puso)
programme.desc: It’s a world where greed and violence is the rule. It’s world where one has to go with the flow in order to survive. And for a man who stick by his guns, it’s worse than hell. He must risk his life and even those he cares for in order for all of them to get out of the dark hole well and alive.

programme.title: Talahib At Rosas
programme.desc: Heiress Anjanette Abayari, who had just arrived from the US, was abducted by rebels while on her way home to see her father. Experienced tracker Cesar Montano, who was serving time in jail, was released to find her in exchange for his freedom.
